revised_title: Population Dynamics of White Clover in Permanent Pastures: The Demography of Leaves and Nodes per Shoot Axis
tldr: This study investigates the population dynamics of white clover (Trifolium repens) in a permanent pasture, focusing on the dynamics of leaves and nodes per shoot axis. The research analyzes seasonal and spatial variations in growth components and environmental factors, providing insights into the behavior of white clover plants in grass-dominated communities.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biology
